objects.text:
✓ Spinning Palm Tree
✓ Adjustable Leaf Bed
✓ Relaxing Hammock
✓ Includes 2 Cute Cats

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner features a playful and vibrant design that highlights a pet-themed product. The background consists of a geometric split between light mint green and deep forest green, overlayed with diagonal stripes, circles, and subtle wave patterns to add texture. The product image of a cat playset is positioned on the right, tilted to emphasize dimension and central focus. Key text elements include the title (`heading`), a themed subheading (`subheading`), feature list (`description`), encouraging tagline (`tagline`), bold pricing (`price`), and a call-to-action button with a rectangular green shape (`cta_background`) and text (`cta`) prompting users to shop. 

**Color Palette:**
- Light Mint Green: `#bde9c9`
- Forest Green: `#28572a`
- Accent Green: `#027223`
- Black: `#000000`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: This playful product image features a vibrant color palette, ideal for a children’s advertisement banner. It blends bold and pastel tones harmoniously, creating a lively yet soft appeal. Bright pink (#EF4797) is prominently used for the upper playhouse structure, standing out while harmonizing with the purple (#B98CE0) and lavender elements, like the paw sign and accessories. Mint green (#47C6A3) is used for leaves and grass, adding freshness, while sand beige (#F3C8A5) mimics a natural base. Accent colors like sky blue (#5AC3E7) and bright red (#E73B6B) draw attention to smaller items. Overall, this palette evokes fun, warmth, and approachability.
